title: Wall Street Is Dancing While Trump Assaults Free Markets. It Won’t End Well
full_text: Wall Street Is Dancing While Trump Assaults Free Markets. It Won’t End Well. The titans of American industry decry the government putting its thumb on the scale — except when the thumb belongs to Trump. Imagine if President Barack Obama or God forbid, Bernie Sanders decided to have the Justice Department open a criminal investigation into the chairman of the Federal Reserve. What if a Democratic pr… [+5057 chars]
